Chariot class System Defense Boat (Civilian Spaceship)

The Chariot class is a standard Imperial SDB design. Hundreds are in service with the planetary navies of the industrial worlds of Lunion and Strouden in the Spinward Marches alone. While the fuel supply is sufficient for thirty full days of operation at maximum power, it is more often stretched to provide 75 days of operation at 40% power, enough for 1-G maneuver and full life support. If operated in life support and passive sensor only mode, as with a loiter operation during an enemy attack on the system, only one percent of the power capacity is required. This would allow the vessels to wait up to 4375 days between fuelings--which is to say, as long as necessary.
